Title: The Beginning
Writer: Rob Grant (creator), Doug Naylor (creator), Doug Naylor
Actors: Chris Barrie, Craig Charles, Danny John-Jules, Robert Llewellyn
Plot: The Red Dwarf is surrounded by hostile Annihilators and a Simulant death ship,with only two forks and a pencil sharpener for weapons. The crew flee in the shuttle and hide in an asteroid ...
